job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: pLocal Candidates Onlypp	7 years experience in Site Reliability Engineering DevOps or Software Engineering rolespp	10 years experience in Site Reliability Engineering DevOps or Software Engineering rolespp	4 years experience developing in Golang Python or other programming languagespp	2 years experience in IaC tools and languages such as Terraform Ansible Packer or Helmpp	2 years experience with cloud providers preferably AWSpp	Ability to prioritize communicate well design for repeatability and scalability exude ownership and dig beneath the hood with technologyp
